name: Yacht Game
description:
Yacht is a dice game, similar to the Latin American game Generala, the English game of Poker Dice.

You can roll the dice up to three times.
You must put the score even if you don't have a combination.
Try to score the highest amount you can.

This app contains the following well-known rules.
-Yacht
-Yacht (wikipedia rule)
-Yatzy
